spec.name: Zaouiya Kadiriya Boudchichiya
spec.description: Zaouiya Kadiriya Boudchichiya is a local religious center (Zaouiya) for the prominent **Qadiriyya Boutchichiyya Sufi order**. This urban location serves as a community and spiritual center for the brotherhood's followers in the city, providing a space for religious rituals (dhikr), spiritual guidance, and social interaction.

access.comment: Access is generally restricted to members of the Sufi order or with prior permission.
